paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from a study on mismatch repair-deficient colorectal cancers.

functional_data.summary: Among 101 MSH2/MLH1-mutant CRC (MSI-H) patients, 46 CRC patients had 88 (75 unique) somatic BRCA2 mutations including 9 frameshift/nonsense mutations, 56 missense mutations, and 9 silent mutations along with one mutation in a splicing site.

variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the distinct pattern of BRCA2 mutations in MSI-H CRCs compared to non-MSI-H CRCs.
key_quotes: Among 101 MSH2/MLH1-mutant CRC (MSI-H) patients, 46 CRC patients had 88 (75 unique) somatic BRCA2 mutations.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused solely on BRCA2 variants as per instructions.
